segments.text: Fine , thanks . I am Wang Lin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Glad to meet you , Wang Lin . I am Mary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is this your first time in Beijing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . My company has an office here , and I have just been transferred .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is my phone number . If you need anyone to show you around , call me .
segments.speaker: S1
